document_data.name: Kondar
document_data.Description: The bastard sword was named after its original owner and was more powerful when used against shapechangers, including [[doppelganger]]s. The [[sword]] also grew warm in the presence of shapeshifters.
document_data.History: In [[1368 DR]], it was carried by [[Aldeth Sashenstar]]. [[Gorion's Ward]] may have received the sword for helping Aldeth in the [[Cloakwood]], or later, after helping him root out the doppelgangers infesting the [[Seven Suns]].
